# File lib/gherkin/tools/files.rb, line 23
      def scan(file, listener)
        parser = Gherkin::Parser::Parser.new(listener, true, "root")
        lexer = Gherkin::I18nLexer.new(parser, false)
        begin
          lexer.scan(IO.read(file))
        rescue => e
          e.message << " (#{file})"
          raise e
        end
      end
